text: Takave tinodzikinura mariri kwavari: “Hupenyu kuhupenyu, ziso kuziso, mhuno kumhuno, nzeve kunzeve, zino kuzino, uye zvironda zvakafanirana.” Asi uyo anoregerera semupiro, zvichave kwaari ruregerero rwezvitadzo zvake. Uye uyo asingatongi kuburikidza nezvakadzikinurwa naAllah, vakadaro ndivo vanhu vanoita mabasa akaipa
